date.description: The date for which the data is recorded.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the channel.

video_id.description: The unique identifier for the video.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the video was viewed live or on-demand.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether the viewer is subscribed to the channel or not.

country_code.description: The country code where the data was collected.

playback_location_type.description: The type of playback location, e.g., YouTube watch page, YouTube app.

traffic_source_type.description: The source through which traffic was generated, e.g., suggested videos, YouTube search.

device_type.description: The type of device used to access the video, e.g., mobile, desktop.

operating_system.description: The operating system of the device used to access the video.

views.description: The total number of views for a video.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time, in minutes, for a video.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration, in seconds, that viewers watched a video.

average_view_duration_percentage.description: The average percentage of a video that viewers watched.

red_views.description: The number of views from YouTube Red subscribers.

red_watch_time_minutes.description: The watch time in minutes from YouTube Red subscribers.
